177 static void AoAProcHWA_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation(cmplx16ImRe_t *rxChComp,
178  uint32_t numObj,
179  uint32_t numAnt,
180  cmplx16ImRe_t *symbolsIn,
181  cmplx16ImRe_t *symbolsOut)
182 {
183  int32_t Re, Im;
184  uint32_t i, j;
185  uint32_t antIndx;
186  uint32_t objIdx;
187 
188  for (objIdx = 0; objIdx < numObj; objIdx++)
189  {
190  j = 0;
191  /* Compensation of azimuth antennas */
192  for (antIndx = 0; antIndx < numAnt; antIndx++)
193  {
194  i = objIdx*numAnt + antIndx;
195  Re = (int32_t) symbolsIn[i].real * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].real -
196  (int32_t) symbolsIn[i].imag * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].imag;
197 
198  Im = (int32_t) symbolsIn[i].real * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].imag +
199  (int32_t) symbolsIn[i].imag * (int32_t) rxChComp[j].real;
200  MATHUTILS_ROUND_AND_SATURATE_Q15(Re);
201  MATHUTILS_ROUND_AND_SATURATE_Q15(Im);
202 
203  symbolsOut[i].real = (int16_t) Re;
204  symbolsOut[i].imag = (int16_t) Im;
205  j++;
206  }
207  }
208 }

244 static int32_t AoAProcHWA_config2DSingleBinInp_EDMA
245 (
246  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
247  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res,
248  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams,
249  uint32_t srcBuffAddr,
250  uint32_t dstBuffAddr,
251  uint32_t numIterations,
252  bool forAzimuthHeatMap
253 )
254 {
255  int32_t retVal = 0;
256  volatile bool edmaTransComplete = false ;
257  uint16_t numBlocks;
258  DPEDMA_ChainingCfg chainingCfg;
259  DPEDMA_syncABCfg syncABCfg;
260 
261 
262  if (forAzimuthHeatMap)
263  {
264  /* Load to HWA only azimuth antennas */
265  numBlocks = DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim * DPParams->numDopplerChirps;
266  }
267  else
268  {
269  /* Load to HWA all antennas, azimuth and elevation */
270  numBlocks = (DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim + DPParams->numVirtualAntElev) * DPParams->numDopplerChirps;
271  }
272  /* Copy one Range bin to HWA memory */
273  chainingCfg.chainingChan = res->edmaHwaInSignature.channel;
274  chainingCfg.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = true;
275  chainingCfg.isFinalChainingEnabled = true;
276 
277  syncABCfg.srcAddress = srcBuffAddr;
278  syncABCfg.destAddress = dstBuffAddr;
279  syncABCfg.aCount = sizeof(uint32_t);
280  syncABCfg.bCount = numBlocks;
281  syncABCfg.cCount = numIterations;
282  syncABCfg.srcBIdx = DPParams->numRangeBins * sizeof(uint32_t);
283  syncABCfg.dstBIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
284  syncABCfg.srcCIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
285  syncABCfg.dstCIdx = 0;
286 
287  retVal = DPEDMA_configSyncAB(res->edmaHandle,
288  &res->edmaHwaIn,
289  &chainingCfg,
290  &syncABCfg,
291  false,//isEventTriggered
292  false, //isIntermediateTransferCompletionEnabled
293  false,//isTransferCompletionEnabled
294  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
295  NULL);//transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
296  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
297  {
298  goto exit;
299  }
300 
301  /* Copy one hot signature to trigger HWA 2D FFT */
302  retVal = DPEDMAHWA_configOneHotSignature(res->edmaHandle,
303  &res->edmaHwaInSignature,
304  hwaHandle,
305  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx,
306  false);
307 
308  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
309  {
310  goto exit;
311  }
312 exit:
313  return(retVal);
314 }
315 
334 static int32_t AoAProcHWA_config2DSingleBinOut_EDMA
335 (
336  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res,
337  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams,
338  uint32_t srcBuffPtr,
339  uint32_t dstBuffPtr,
340  uint32_t numIterations,
341  bool chainEnable
342 )
343 {
344  int32_t retVal;
345  int16_t dstIterationIncrBytes;
346  bool isFinalTransferCompletionEnabled;
347  bool isIntermediateTransferCompletionEnabled;
348  DPEDMA_ChainingCfg chainingCfg;
349  DPEDMA_syncABCfg syncABCfg;
350  uint16_t aCount;
351 
352  if (chainEnable)
353  {
354  /* This mode is used for azimuth heatmap */
355  dstIterationIncrBytes = DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(uint32_t);
356  isIntermediateTransferCompletionEnabled = false;
357  isFinalTransferCompletionEnabled = true;
358  aCount = DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(uint32_t);
359  }
360  else
361  {
362  dstIterationIncrBytes = 0;
363  isIntermediateTransferCompletionEnabled = true;
364  isFinalTransferCompletionEnabled = true;
365  aCount = (DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim + DPParams->numVirtualAntElev) * sizeof(uint32_t);
366  }
367 
368  /* Copy one Range bin to HWA memory */
369  chainingCfg.chainingChan = res->edmaHwaIn.channel;
370  chainingCfg.isIntermediateChainingEnabled = chainEnable;
371  chainingCfg.isFinalChainingEnabled = chainEnable;
372 
373  syncABCfg.srcAddress = srcBuffPtr;
374  syncABCfg.destAddress = dstBuffPtr;
375  syncABCfg.aCount = aCount;
376  syncABCfg.bCount = 1;
377  syncABCfg.cCount = numIterations;
378  syncABCfg.srcBIdx = 0;
379  syncABCfg.dstBIdx = 0;
380  syncABCfg.srcCIdx = 0;
381  syncABCfg.dstCIdx = dstIterationIncrBytes;
382 
383  retVal = DPEDMA_configSyncAB(res->edmaHandle,
384  &res->edmaHwaOut,
385  &chainingCfg,
386  &syncABCfg,
387  true,//isEventTriggered
388  isIntermediateTransferCompletionEnabled,
389  isFinalTransferCompletionEnabled,
390  NULL, //transferCompletionCallbackFxn
391  NULL);//transferCompletionCallbackFxnArg
392 
393  if (retVal != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
394  {
395  goto exit;
396  }
397 
398 exit:
399  return(retVal);
400 }

490 int32_t AoAProcHWA_dataPathConfigHwaAoa
491 (
492  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
493  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res,
494  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams,
495  uint32_t numObjOut,
496  uint32_t hwaMemBankAddr[4]
497 )
498 {
499  int32_t retVal = 0;
500  HWA_CommonConfig hwaCommonConfig;
501  int32_t numHwaParamSets3D;
502 
503  /* Disable the HWA */
504  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
505  if (retVal != 0)
506  {
507  goto exit;
508  }
509 
510  if(DPParams->numVirtualAntElev == 0)
511  {
512  retVal =
513  HWAutil_configAngleEstAzimuth(hwaHandle,
514  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx,
515  (DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim + DPParams->numVirtualAntElev),
516  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS,
517  numObjOut,
518  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_ANGLE_INP_HWA_MEM_BANK]),
519  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_ANGLE_AZIM_ABS_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK]));
520 
521  if (retVal != 0)
522  {
523  goto exit;
524  }
525  numHwaParamSets3D = 1;
526  }
527  else
528  {
529  retVal =
530  HWAutil_configAngleEstAzimuthElevation(hwaHandle,
531  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx,
532  DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim,
533  DPParams->numVirtualAntElev,
534  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS,
535  numObjOut,
536  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_ANGLE_INP_HWA_MEM_BANK]),
537  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_ANGLE_AZIM_ABS_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK]),
538  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_ANGLE_AZIM_CPLX_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK]),
539  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_ANGLE_ELEV_CPLX_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK]));
540 
541  if (retVal != 0)
542  {
543  goto exit;
544  }
545  numHwaParamSets3D = 3;
546  }
547 
548  /***********************/
549  /* HWA COMMON CONFIG */
550  /***********************/
551  /* Config Common Registers */
552  hwaCommonConfig.configMask = HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_NUMLOOPS |
553  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTARTIDX |
554  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTOPIDX |
555  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_FFT1DENABLE |
556  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_INTERFERENCETHRESHOLD;
557 
558  hwaCommonConfig.numLoops = 1;
559  hwaCommonConfig.paramStartIdx = res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx;
560  hwaCommonConfig.paramStopIdx = res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx + (numHwaParamSets3D - 1);
561  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.fft1DEnable = HWA_FEATURE_BIT_DISABLE;
562  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.interferenceThreshold = 0xFFFFFF;
563 
564  retVal = HWA_configCommon(hwaHandle, &hwaCommonConfig);
565  if (retVal != 0)
566  {
567  goto exit;
568  }
569 exit:
570  return(retVal);
571 }
572 
608 static int32_t HWAutil_configDopplerFFTSingleRangeBin
609 (
610  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
611  uint8_t paramSetStartIdx,
612  uint32_t numDopplerChirps,
613  uint32_t numDopplerBins,
614  uint32_t numOutSamplesPerFft,
615  uint8_t numRxAnt,
616  uint8_t numTxAntIn,
617  uint8_t numTxAntOut,
618  uint32_t windowOffset,
619  uint8_t winSym,
620  uint8_t dmaTriggerSource,
621  uint8_t dmaTriggerDest,
622  uint16_t hwaMemAzimSource,
623  uint16_t hwaMemAzimDest
624 )
625 {
626  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg;
627  HWA_InterruptConfig paramISRConfig;
628  int32_t retVal = 0;
629  uint8_t numVirtualAntOut = numTxAntOut * numRxAnt;
630  int32_t i;
631 
632  /* Disable the HWA */
633  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
634  if (retVal != 0)
635  {
636  goto exit;
637  }
638 
639  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(HWA_ParamConfig));
640 
641 
642  //Doppler FFT
643  hwaParamCfg.dmaTriggerSrc = dmaTriggerSource;
644  hwaParamCfg.accelMode = HWA_ACCELMODE_FFT; //do FFT
645 
646  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numDopplerChirps - 1; //size in samples - 1
647 
648  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = numRxAnt * sizeof(uint32_t); //
649  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numRxAnt - 1;
650  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = sizeof(uint32_t); //should be dont care
651  hwaParamCfg.source.srcShift = 0; //no shift
652  hwaParamCfg.source.srcCircShiftWrap = 0; //no shift
653  hwaParamCfg.source.srcRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //complex data
654  hwaParamCfg.source.srcWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //16-bit
655  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //signed
656  hwaParamCfg.source.srcConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
657  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 0;
658  hwaParamCfg.source.bpmEnable = 0; //bpm removal not enabled
659  hwaParamCfg.source.bpmPhase = 0; //dont care
660 
661  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = numOutSamplesPerFft -1;
662  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = numVirtualAntOut * sizeof(uint32_t);
663  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = sizeof(uint32_t) ; //should be dont care
664  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_COMPLEX; //same as input - complex
665  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT; //same as input - 16 bit
666  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED; //same as input - signed
667  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstConjugate = 0; //no conjugate
668  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 8 ;
669  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSkipInit = 0; // no skipping
670 
671  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
672  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_floorLog2(numDopplerBins);
673  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0x3FF; //LSB fftSize bits are relevant
674  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.interfZeroOutEn = 0; //disabled
675  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 1; //enabled
676  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowStart = windowOffset; //start of window RAM
677  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winSymm = winSym;
678  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winInterpolateMode = 0;
679  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_LOG2_DISABLED;
680  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftOutMode = HWA_FFT_MODE_OUTPUT_DEFAULT;
681 
682  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
683 
684  for (i = 0; i < numTxAntOut; i++)
685  {
686  if (i == 0)
687  {
688  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_DMA;
689  }
690  else
691  {
692  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
693  }
694  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = hwaMemAzimSource + i * numDopplerChirps * numRxAnt * sizeof(uint32_t); // address is relative to start of MEM0
695  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = hwaMemAzimDest + i * numRxAnt * sizeof(uint32_t); // address is relative to start of MEM0
696  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, (uint8_t) (paramSetStartIdx + i), &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
697  if (retVal != 0)
698  {
699  goto exit;
700  }
701 
702  /* Disable DMA/interrupt hookup to all except the last one */
703  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
704  paramSetStartIdx + i,
705  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
706  /* Output interrupt to DMA only by last param set */
707  if (i == (numTxAntOut-1))
708  {
709  /* Last param set: enable the DMA hookup to this paramset so that data gets copied out */
710  paramISRConfig.interruptTypeFlag = HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA;
711  paramISRConfig.dma.dstChannel = dmaTriggerDest; /* EDMA channel to trigger to copy the data out */
712  paramISRConfig.cpu.callbackArg = NULL;
713  retVal = HWA_enableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
714  paramSetStartIdx + i,
715  &paramISRConfig);
716  }
717  if (retVal != 0)
718  {
719  goto exit;
720  }
721  }
722 exit:
723  return (retVal);
724 }
725 
745 static int32_t AoAProc_HWAutil_configCommon (HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
746  uint16_t numLoops,
747  uint16_t paramStartIdx,
748  uint16_t numParams)
749 {
750  int32_t errCode = 0;
751  HWA_CommonConfig hwaCommonConfig;
752 
753  /* Disable the HWA */
754  errCode = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
755  if (errCode != 0)
756  {
757  goto exit;
758  }
759 
760  /***********************/
761  /* HWA COMMON CONFIG */
762  /***********************/
763  /* Config Common Registers */
764  hwaCommonConfig.configMask =
765  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_NUMLOOPS |
766  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTARTIDX |
767  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTOPIDX |
768  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_FFT1DENABLE |
769  HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_INTERFERENCETHRESHOLD;
770 
771  hwaCommonConfig.numLoops = numLoops;
772  hwaCommonConfig.paramStartIdx = paramStartIdx;
773  hwaCommonConfig.paramStopIdx = paramStartIdx + (numParams-1);
774 
775  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.fft1DEnable = HWA_FEATURE_BIT_DISABLE;
776  hwaCommonConfig.fftConfig.interferenceThreshold = 0xFFFFFF;
777  errCode = HWA_configCommon(hwaHandle, &hwaCommonConfig);
778 exit:
779  return (errCode);
780 }

804 static int32_t HWAutil_configAngleEstAzimuth
805 (
806  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
807  uint8_t paramSetStartIdx,
808  uint32_t numVirtualAnt,
809  uint32_t fftOutSize,
810  uint32_t numIter,
811  uint16_t hwaSourceBufOffset,
812  uint16_t hwaDestBufOffset
813 )
814 {
815  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg;
816  int32_t retVal = 0;
817 
818  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
819  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
820 
821  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = hwaSourceBufOffset;
822 
823  hwaParamCfg.source.srcWidth = HWA_SAMPLES_WIDTH_16BIT;
824  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numVirtualAnt-1;
825  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
826  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = numVirtualAnt * sizeof(uint32_t);
827  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numIter-1;
828  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
829  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 8;
830 
831  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
832  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
833  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_ONLY_ENABLED;
834  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_ceilLog2(fftOutSize);//assumes power of 2;
835  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
836  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.winSymm = 1;
837  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowStart = 0; //do not care
838  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0; //no scaling
839 
840  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = hwaDestBufOffset;
841  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = fftOutSize-1;
842  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(uint16_t);//abs
843  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = fftOutSize * sizeof(uint16_t);
844  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_UNSIGNED;
845  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 3;
846  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_REAL;
847 
848  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, paramSetStartIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
849  if (retVal != 0)
850  {
851  goto exit;
852  }
853 
854  /* Disable DMA/interrupt hookup to all except the last one */
855  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
856  paramSetStartIdx,
857  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
858 exit:
859  return(retVal);
860 }
861 
891 static int32_t HWAutil_configAngleEstAzimuthElevation
892 (
893  HWA_Handle hwaHandle,
894  uint8_t paramSetStartIdx,
895  uint32_t numVirtualAntAzim,
896  uint32_t numVirtualAntElev,
897  uint32_t fftOutSize,
898  uint32_t numIter,
899  uint16_t hwaSourceBufOffset,
900  uint16_t hwaDestAzimAbsBufOffset,
901  uint16_t hwaDestAzimCplxBufOffset,
902  uint16_t hwaDestElevCplxBufOffset
903 )
904 {
905  HWA_ParamConfig hwaParamCfg;
906  int32_t retVal = 0;
907  int32_t i;
908 
909  /**************First Param set computes the complex values of the elevation-FFT **********/
910  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
911  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
912 
913  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = (uint16_t) (hwaSourceBufOffset + (numVirtualAntAzim * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t)));
914  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numVirtualAntElev-1;
915  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
916  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = (numVirtualAntAzim + numVirtualAntElev) * sizeof(uint32_t);
917  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numIter-1;
918  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
919  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 8;
920 
921 
922  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
923  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
924  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_ceilLog2(fftOutSize);//assumes power of 2;
925  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
926  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0; //no scaling
927 
928  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) hwaDestElevCplxBufOffset;
929  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = fftOutSize-1;
930  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
931  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = fftOutSize * sizeof(uint32_t);
932  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
933  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 3;
934 
935  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, paramSetStartIdx, &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
936  if (retVal != 0)
937  {
938  goto exit;
939  }
940 
941  /**************Second Param set computes the absolute values of the azimuth-FFT **********/
942  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
943  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
944 
945  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = (uint16_t) hwaSourceBufOffset;
946  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numVirtualAntAzim-1;
947  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
948  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = (numVirtualAntAzim + numVirtualAntElev) * sizeof(uint32_t);
949  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numIter-1;
950  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
951  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 8;
952 
953  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
954  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
955  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.magLogEn = HWA_FFT_MODE_MAGNITUDE_ONLY_ENABLED;
956  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_ceilLog2(fftOutSize);//assumes power of 2;
957  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
958  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0; //no scaling
959 
960  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) hwaDestAzimAbsBufOffset;
961  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = fftOutSize-1;
962  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(uint16_t);//abs
963  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = fftOutSize * sizeof(uint16_t);
964  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_UNSIGNED;
965  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 3;
966  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstRealComplex = HWA_SAMPLES_FORMAT_REAL;
967 
968  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, (uint8_t) (paramSetStartIdx + 1), &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
969  if (retVal != 0)
970  {
971  goto exit;
972  }
973 
974  /**************Third Param set computes the complex values of the azimuth-FFT **********/
975  memset( (void*) &hwaParamCfg, 0, sizeof(hwaParamCfg));
976  hwaParamCfg.triggerMode = HWA_TRIG_MODE_IMMEDIATE;
977 
978  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAddr = (uint16_t) hwaSourceBufOffset;
979  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAcnt = numVirtualAntAzim-1;
980  hwaParamCfg.source.srcAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
981  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBIdx = (numVirtualAntAzim + numVirtualAntElev) * sizeof(uint32_t);
982  hwaParamCfg.source.srcBcnt = numIter-1;
983  hwaParamCfg.source.srcSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
984  hwaParamCfg.source.srcScale = 8;
985 
986  hwaParamCfg.complexMultiply.mode = HWA_COMPLEX_MULTIPLY_MODE_DISABLE;
987  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftEn = 1;
988  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.fftSize = mathUtils_ceilLog2(fftOutSize);//assumes power of 2;
989  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.windowEn = 0;
990  hwaParamCfg.accelModeArgs.fftMode.butterflyScaling = 0; //no scaling
991 
992  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAddr = (uint16_t) hwaDestAzimCplxBufOffset;
993  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAcnt = fftOutSize-1;
994  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstAIdx = sizeof(uint32_t);
995  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstBIdx = fftOutSize * sizeof(uint32_t);
996  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstSign = HWA_SAMPLES_SIGNED;
997  hwaParamCfg.dest.dstScale = 3;
998 
999  retVal = HWA_configParamSet(hwaHandle, (uint8_t) (paramSetStartIdx + 2), &hwaParamCfg, NULL);
1000  if (retVal != 0)
1001  {
1002  goto exit;
1003  }
1004 
1005  /* Disable DMA/interrupt hookup to all param sets */
1006  for (i=0; i<3; i++)
1007  {
1008  retVal = HWA_disableParamSetInterrupt(hwaHandle,
1009  paramSetStartIdx + i,
1010  HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_DMA | HWA_PARAMDONE_INTERRUPT_TYPE_CPU);
1011  if (retVal != 0)
1012  {
1013  goto exit;
1014  }
1015  }
1016 exit:
1017  return(retVal);
1018 }
1019

1043 )

1079 
1111 uint32_t AoAProcHWA_XYZestimation
1112 (
1113  uint16_t *azimFFTPtr,
1114  uint16_t *elevFFTPtr,
1115  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
1116  uint32_t objOutIdx,
1117  uint32_t objInIdx,
1118  uint32_t objInHwaIdx,
1119  uint32_t maxIdx,
1120  uint32_t peakVal
1121 )
1122 {
1123  int32_t sMaxIdx;
1124  float temp;
1125  float Wx, Wz;
1126  float range;
1127  float limitScale;
1128  float x, y, z;
1129  float peakAzimRe, peakAzimIm, peakElevRe, peakElevIm;
1130  uint32_t numAngleBins;
1131  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
1132  DPIF_CFARDetList *objIn = res->cfarRngDopSnrList;
1133  DPIF_PointCloudCartesian *objOut = res->detObjOut;
1134  DPIF_PointCloudSideInfo *objOutSideInfo = res->detObjOutSideInfo;
1135 
1136  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *params = &aoaHwaObj->params;
1137  uint16_t numDopplerBins = params->numDopplerBins;
1138 
1139  numAngleBins = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS;
1140 
1141  if (params->numVirtualAntElev > 0)
1142  {
1143  peakAzimIm = (float) ((int16_t) (*(azimFFTPtr + objInHwaIdx*2*numAngleBins + maxIdx*2)));
1144  peakAzimRe = (float) ((int16_t) (*(azimFFTPtr + objInHwaIdx*2*numAngleBins + maxIdx*2+1)));
1145  peakElevIm = (float) ((int16_t) (*(elevFFTPtr + objInHwaIdx*2*numAngleBins + maxIdx*2)));
1146  peakElevRe = (float) ((int16_t) (*(elevFFTPtr + objInHwaIdx*2*numAngleBins + maxIdx*2+1)));
1147  }
1148 
1149  range = objIn[objInIdx].rangeIdx * params->rangeStep;
1150 
1151  /* Compensate for range bias */
1152  range -= aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg.rangeBias;
1153  if (range < 0)
1154  {
1155  range = 0;
1156  }
1157 
1158  if(maxIdx > (numAngleBins/2 -1))
1159  {
1160  sMaxIdx = maxIdx - numAngleBins;
1161  }
1162  else
1163  {
1164  sMaxIdx = maxIdx;
1165  }
1166 
1167  Wx = 2 * (float) sMaxIdx / numAngleBins;
1168  /* Check if it is within configured field of view */
1169 
1170  x = range * Wx;
1171 
1172  if (params->numVirtualAntElev > 0)
1173  {
1174  Wz = atan2(peakAzimIm * peakElevRe - peakAzimRe * peakElevIm,
1175  peakAzimRe * peakElevRe + peakAzimIm * peakElevIm)/PI_ + (2 * Wx);
1176 
1177  if (Wz > 1)
1178  {
1179  Wz = Wz - 2;
1180  }
1181  else if (Wz < -1)
1182  {
1183  Wz = Wz + 2;
1184  }
1185  /* Check if it is within configured field of view */
1186  if((Wz < aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.minElevationSineVal) || (Wz > aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.maxElevationSineVal))
1187  {
1188  goto exit;
1189  }
1190 
1191  z = range * Wz;
1192  /*record wz for debugging/testing*/
1193  res->detObjElevationAngle[objOutIdx] = Wz;
1194  limitScale = sqrt(1 - Wz*Wz);
1195  }
1196  else
1197  {
1198  z = 0;
1199  limitScale = 1;
1200  }
1201 
1202  if((Wx < (limitScale * aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.minAzimuthSineVal)) ||
1203  (Wx > (limitScale * aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.maxAzimuthSineVal)))
1204  {
1205  goto exit;
1206  }
1207 
1208  temp = range*range -x*x -z*z;
1209  if (temp > 0)
1210  {
1211  y = sqrt(temp);
1212  }
1213  else
1214  {
1215  goto exit;
1216  }
1217 
1218  objOut[objOutIdx].x = x;
1219  objOut[objOutIdx].y = y;
1220  objOut[objOutIdx].z = z;
1221 
1222  objOut[objOutIdx].velocity = params->dopplerStep *
1223  DOPPLER_IDX_TO_SIGNED(objIn[objInIdx].dopplerIdx, numDopplerBins);
1224  objOutSideInfo[objOutIdx].noise = objIn[objInIdx].noise;
1225  objOutSideInfo[objOutIdx].snr = objIn[objInIdx].snr;
1226  res->detObj2dAzimIdx[objOutIdx] = maxIdx;
1227 
1228  objOutIdx++;
1229 
1230 exit:
1231  return (objOutIdx);
1232 }
1233 
1254 static float aoaHwa_calcCompIdx
1255 (
1256  uint16_t dopplerIdx,
1257  uint32_t numDopplerBins,
1258  uint32_t numTxAnt
1259 )
1260 {
1261  float dopplerCompensationIdx;
1262 
1263  /* Doppler compensation index calculation */
1264  if (dopplerIdx >= numDopplerBins/2)
1265  {
1266  dopplerCompensationIdx = ((int32_t) dopplerIdx - (int32_t) numDopplerBins);
1267  }
1268  else
1269  {
1270  dopplerCompensationIdx = dopplerIdx;
1271  }
1272 
1273  /* Doppler phase correction is 1/2 or (1/3 in elevation case) of the phase between two chirps of the same antenna */
1274  dopplerCompensationIdx = dopplerCompensationIdx / (float) numTxAnt;
1275  if (dopplerCompensationIdx < 0)
1276  {
1277  dopplerCompensationIdx += (float) numDopplerBins;
1278  }
1279 
1280  return dopplerCompensationIdx;
1281 }
1282 
1301 static void aoaHwa_dopplerComp
1302 (
1303  cmplx16ImRe_t *in,
1304  cmplx16ImRe_t *out,
1305  float Cos,
1306  float Sin
1307 )
1308 {
1309  float yRe, yIm;
1310 
1311  /* Rotate symbol (correct the phase) */
1312  yRe = in->real * Cos + in->imag * Sin;
1313  yIm = in->imag * Cos - in->real * Sin;
1314  out->real = (int16_t) yRe;
1315  out->imag = (int16_t) yIm;
1316 }
1317 
1347 static void aoaHwa_dopplerCompensation
1348 (
1349  uint32_t numDetectedObjects,
1350  uint32_t *srcPtr,
1351  DPIF_CFARDetList *cfarOutList,
1352  uint32_t *dstPtr,
1353  uint32_t numTxAnt,
1354  uint32_t numRxAnt,
1355  uint32_t numVirtualAntAzim,
1356  uint32_t numVirtualAntElev,
1357  uint32_t numDopplerBins
1358 )
1359 {
1360  uint32_t index;
1361  uint32_t j;
1362  uint16_t dopplerIdx;
1363  float dopplerCompensationIdx;
1364 
1365  for(index = 0; index < numDetectedObjects; index ++)
1366  {
1367  dopplerIdx = cfarOutList->dopplerIdx;
1368 
1369  /* transfer data corresponding to azimuth virtual antennas (corresponding to chirp of antenna Tx0) */
1370  for(j = 0; j < numRxAnt; j++)
1371  {
1372  *dstPtr++ = *srcPtr++;
1373  }
1374 
1375  /* transfer data corresponding to azimuth virtual antennas (corresponding to chirp of antenna Tx1) */
1376  if (numVirtualAntAzim > numRxAnt)
1377  {
1378  float Cos,Sin;
1379 
1380  dopplerCompensationIdx = aoaHwa_calcCompIdx(dopplerIdx, numDopplerBins, numTxAnt);
1381 
1382  Cos = cos(2*PI_*dopplerCompensationIdx/numDopplerBins);
1383  Sin = sin(2*PI_*dopplerCompensationIdx/numDopplerBins);
1384 
1385  for(j = numRxAnt; j < numVirtualAntAzim; j++)
1386  {
1387  aoaHwa_dopplerComp((cmplx16ImRe_t *)srcPtr++, (cmplx16ImRe_t *)dstPtr++, Cos, Sin);
1388  }
1389 
1390  if (numVirtualAntElev > 0)
1391  {
1392  /* transfer data corresponding to elevation virtual antennas, (corresponding to chirp of antenna Tx2) */
1393  float Cos2, Sin2;
1394  /* Doppler phase shift is 2/3 */
1395  Cos2 = Cos * Cos - Sin * Sin;
1396  Sin2 = 2 * Cos * Sin;
1397  for(j = 0; j < numVirtualAntElev; j++)
1398  {
1399  aoaHwa_dopplerComp((cmplx16ImRe_t *)srcPtr++, (cmplx16ImRe_t *)dstPtr++, Cos2, Sin2);
1400  }
1401  }
1402  }
1403  cfarOutList++;
1404  }
1405 }
1406 
1437 static uint32_t AoAProcHWA_angleEstimationAzimElev
1438 (
1439  uint32_t objInstartIdx,
1440  uint32_t numObjIn,
1441  uint16_t *azimFFTAbsPtr,
1442  uint16_t *azimFFTPtr,
1443  uint16_t *elevFFTPtr,
1444  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
1445  uint32_t objOutIdx
1446 )
1447 {
1448  uint32_t objInIdx, j, maxVal = 0,maxIdx = 0, tempVal;
1449  uint32_t objInHwaIdx;
1450  uint16_t *origAzimFFTAbsPtr;
1451  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
1452  uint32_t numAngleBins = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_NUM_ANGLE_BINS;
1453  uint16_t maxNumObj = res->detObjOutMaxSize;
1454 
1455  for(objInIdx = objInstartIdx, objInHwaIdx = 0; objInIdx < (objInstartIdx + numObjIn); objInIdx++, objInHwaIdx++)
1456  {
1457  if (objOutIdx >= maxNumObj)
1458  {
1459  break;
1460  }
1461  maxVal = 0;
1462  /* For this detected object, save starting point of "FFT absolute array",
1463  to be used later for the detection of the second azimuth on the same
1464  range and doppler*/
1465  origAzimFFTAbsPtr = azimFFTAbsPtr;
1466  for(j=0; j < numAngleBins; j++)
1467  {
1468  tempVal = *azimFFTAbsPtr++;
1469  if(tempVal > maxVal)
1470  {
1471  maxVal = tempVal;
1472  maxIdx = j;
1473  }
1474  }
1475 
1476  /* Estimate x,y,z */
1477  objOutIdx = AoAProcHWA_XYZestimation(azimFFTPtr,
1478  elevFFTPtr,
1479  aoaHwaObj,
1480  objOutIdx,
1481  objInIdx,
1482  objInHwaIdx,
1483  maxIdx,
1484  maxVal);
1485  if (objOutIdx >= maxNumObj)
1486  {
1487  break;
1488  }
1489  /* Multi peak azimuzth search?*/
1490  if (aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg.enabled)
1491  {
1492  uint32_t leftSearchIdx;
1493  uint32_t rightSearchIdx;
1494  uint32_t secondSearchLen;
1495  uint32_t iModAzimLen;
1496  uint32_t maxVal2;
1497  int32_t k;
1498  uint32_t t;
1499  uint16_t azimIdx = maxIdx;
1500  uint16_t* azimuthMag = origAzimFFTAbsPtr;
1501 
1502  /* Find right edge of the first peak */
1503  t = azimIdx;
1504  leftSearchIdx = (t + 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
1505  k = numAngleBins;
1506  while ((azimuthMag[t] >= azimuthMag[leftSearchIdx]) && (k > 0))
1507  {
1508  t = (t + 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
1509  leftSearchIdx = (leftSearchIdx + 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
1510  k--;
1511  }
1512 
1513  /* Find left edge of the first peak */
1514  t = azimIdx;
1515  rightSearchIdx = (t - 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
1516  k = numAngleBins;
1517  while ((azimuthMag[t] >= azimuthMag[rightSearchIdx]) && (k > 0))
1518  {
1519  t = (t - 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
1520  rightSearchIdx = (rightSearchIdx - 1) & (numAngleBins-1);
1521  k--;
1522  }
1523 
1524  secondSearchLen = ((rightSearchIdx - leftSearchIdx) & (numAngleBins-1)) + 1;
1525  /* Find second peak */
1526  maxVal2 = azimuthMag[leftSearchIdx];
1527  azimIdx = leftSearchIdx;
1528  for (t = leftSearchIdx; t < (leftSearchIdx + secondSearchLen); t++)
1529  {
1530  iModAzimLen = t & (numAngleBins-1);
1531  if (azimuthMag[iModAzimLen] > maxVal2)
1532  {
1533  azimIdx = iModAzimLen;
1534  maxVal2 = azimuthMag[iModAzimLen];
1535  }
1536  }
1537  /* Is second peak greater than threshold? */
1538  if ( (maxVal2 >( ((uint32_t)(maxVal * aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg.multiPeakThrsScal)))) && (objOutIdx < maxNumObj) )
1539  {
1540 
1541  /* Estimate x,y,z for second peak */
1542  objOutIdx = AoAProcHWA_XYZestimation(azimFFTPtr,
1543  elevFFTPtr,
1544  aoaHwaObj,
1545  objOutIdx,
1546  objInIdx,
1547  objInHwaIdx,
1548  azimIdx,
1549  maxVal2);
1550  }
1551  }
1552  }
1553  return(objOutIdx);
1554 }
1555 
1571 int32_t AOAHWA_waitSinglePointFftEdmaOut(AOAHwaObj * aoaHwaObj)
1572 {
1573  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
1574  int32_t errCode = EDMA_NO_ERROR;
1575 
1576  /* wait until transfer done */
1577  volatile bool isTransferDone;
1578  do {
1579  if ((errCode = EDMA_isTransferComplete(res->edmaHandle,
1580  res->edmaHwaIn.channel,
1581  (bool *)&isTransferDone)) != EDMA_NO_ERROR)
1582  {
1583  break;
1584  }
1585  } while (isTransferDone == false);
1586 
1587  return errCode;
1588 }
1589 
1608 int32_t AoAProcHWA_PrepareRangeAzimuthHeatmap(AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
1609  volatile uint32_t *waitTimeLocal)
1610 {
1611  volatile uint32_t startTime1;
1612  int32_t retVal = 0;
1613  uint16_t numParams;
1614  HWA_Handle hwaHandle;
1615  cmplx16ImRe_t *radarCubeBase;
1616  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res;
1617  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams;
1618 
1619  res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
1620  DPParams = &aoaHwaObj->params;
1621  radarCubeBase = (cmplx16ImRe_t *)res->radarCube.data;
1622  hwaHandle = aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle;
1623 
1624  retVal =
1625  HWAutil_configDopplerFFTSingleRangeBin(hwaHandle,
1626  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx,
1627  DPParams->numDopplerChirps,
1628  DPParams->numDopplerBins,
1629  1,
1630  DPParams->numRxAntennas,
1631  DPParams->numTxAntennas,
1632  DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim/DPParams->numRxAntennas,
1633  res->hwaCfg.winRamOffset,
1634  res->hwaCfg.winSym,
1635  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx /* dmaTriggerSrc */,
1636  aoaHwaObj->dmaDestChannel,
1637  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_2DFFT_SINGLE_BIN_INP_HWA_MEM_BANK]),
1638  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_2DFFT_SINGLE_BIN_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK]));
1639  if (retVal != 0)
1640  {
1641  goto exit;
1642  }
1643 
1644  numParams = DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim/DPParams->numRxAntennas; //DPParams->numTxAntennas;
1645  retVal = AoAProc_HWAutil_configCommon (hwaHandle,
1646  DPParams->numRangeBins, //numLoops,
1647  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx, //paramStartIdx,
1648  numParams);
1649  if (retVal != 0)
1650  {
1651  goto exit;
1652  }
1653 
1654  retVal = AoAProcHWA_config2DSingleBinInp_EDMA(hwaHandle, res,
1655  DPParams,
1656  (uint32_t) radarCubeBase,
1657  (uint32_t)aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_2DFFT_SINGLE_BIN_INP_HWA_MEM_BANK],
1658  DPParams->numRangeBins,
1659  true);
1660  if (retVal != 0)
1661  {
1662  goto exit;
1663  }
1664 
1665  retVal = AoAProcHWA_config2DSingleBinOut_EDMA( res,
1666  DPParams,
1667  ((uint32_t)aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_2DFFT_SINGLE_BIN_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK]),
1668  (uint32_t) res->azimuthStaticHeatMap,
1669  DPParams->numRangeBins,
1670  true);
1671  if (retVal != 0)
1672  {
1673  goto exit;
1674  }
1675 
1676  /* Enable the HWA */
1677  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 1);
1678  if (retVal != 0)
1679  {
1680  goto exit;
1681  }
1682 
1683  /* Trigger single 2D FFT */
1684  retVal = AoAProcHWA_dataPathTrigger2DSingleBin(res->edmaHandle,
1685  hwaHandle,
1686  res->edmaHwaIn.channel); //MMW_EDMA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_CH_ID
1687  if (retVal != 0)
1688  {
1689  goto exit;
1690  }
1691 
1692  /* Wait until HWA done with FFT */
1693  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
1694  AoAProcHWA_dataPathWait2DFFTDetObj(aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle);
1695  *waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
1696 
1697  /* Wait until EDMA output is done */
1698  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
1699  retVal = AOAHWA_waitSinglePointFftEdmaOut(aoaHwaObj);
1700  *waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
1701  if (retVal != 0)
1702  {
1703  goto exit;
1704  }
1705 
1706  /* Disable the HWA */
1707  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
1708  if (retVal != 0)
1709  {
1710  goto exit;
1711  }
1712 
1713  /* Rx channel gain/phase offset compensation */
1714  AoAProcHWA_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation(&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg.rxChPhaseComp[0],
1715  DPParams->numRangeBins,
1716  DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim,
1717  res->azimuthStaticHeatMap,
1718  res->azimuthStaticHeatMap);
1719 exit:
1720  return retVal;
1721 }
1722 
1738 void AoAProcHWA_ConvertFov(AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj,
1739  DPU_AoAProc_FovAoaCfg *fovAoaCfg)
1740 {
1741  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.minAzimuthSineVal = sin(fovAoaCfg->minAzimuthDeg / 180. * PI_);
1742  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.maxAzimuthSineVal = sin(fovAoaCfg->maxAzimuthDeg / 180. * PI_);
1743  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.minElevationSineVal = sin(fovAoaCfg->minElevationDeg / 180. * PI_);
1744  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.fovAoaLocalCfg.maxElevationSineVal = sin(fovAoaCfg->maxElevationDeg / 180. * PI_);
1745 }
1746 
1747 DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle DPU_AoAProcHWA_init
1748 (
1749  DPU_AoAProcHWA_InitParams *initParams,
1750  int32_t* errCode
1751 )
1752 {
1753  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj = NULL;
1754  HWA_MemInfo hwaMemInfo;
1755  uint8_t index;
1756  SemaphoreP_Params semParams;
1757 
1758  if ((initParams == NULL) || (initParams->hwaHandle == NULL))
1759  {
1760  *errCode = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
1761  goto exit;
1762  }
1763 
1764  aoaHwaObj = MemoryP_ctrlAlloc(sizeof(AOAHwaObj), 0);
1765  if(aoaHwaObj == NULL)
1766  {
1767  *errCode = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEM;
1768  goto exit;
1769  }
1770 
1771  /* Save for debugging */
1772 #ifdef DBG_AOA_HWA_OBJ_DPU
1773  if (gAoaHwaObjInd < RL_MAX_SUBFRAMES)
1774  {
1775  gAoaHwaObj[gAoaHwaObjInd++] = aoaHwaObj;
1776  }
1777 #endif
1778 
1779  /* Set HWA bank memory address */
1780  *errCode = HWA_getHWAMemInfo(initParams->hwaHandle, &hwaMemInfo);
1781  if (*errCode < 0)
1782  {
1783  goto exit;
1784  }
1785 
1786  /* Initialize memory */
1787  memset((void *)aoaHwaObj, 0, sizeof(AOAHwaObj));
1788 
1789  /* Save init config params */
1790  aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle = initParams->hwaHandle;
1791 
1792  for (index = 0; index < hwaMemInfo.numBanks; index++)
1793  {
1794  aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[index] = hwaMemInfo.baseAddress + index * hwaMemInfo.bankSize;
1795  }
1796 
1797  /* Create semaphore for HWA done */
1798  SemaphoreP_Params_init(&semParams);
1799  semParams.mode = SemaphoreP_Mode_BINARY;
1800  aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle = SemaphoreP_create(0, &semParams);
1801  if(aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle == NULL)
1802  {
1803  *errCode = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ESEMA;
1804  goto exit;
1805  }
1806 
1807 exit:
1808  return ((DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle)aoaHwaObj);
1809 }
1810 
1811 int32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_config
1812 (
1813  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle handle,
1814  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Config *aoaHwaCfg
1815 )
1816 {
1817  int32_t retVal = 0;
1818  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj = (AOAHwaObj *)handle;
1819 
1820  if(aoaHwaObj == NULL)
1821  {
1822  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
1823  goto exit;
1824  }
1825 
1826  /* Check if radar cube formats are supported. */
1827  if (!(aoaHwaCfg->res.radarCube.datafmt == DPIF_RADARCUBE_FORMAT_1))
1828  {
1829  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL__RADARCUBE_DATAFORMAT;
1830  goto exit;
1831  }
1832 
1833 
1834  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.cfarRngDopSnrList,
1835  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_CFAR_DET_LIST_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
1836  {
1837  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_CFAR_DET_LIST;
1838  goto exit;
1839  }
1840 
1841  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.detObjOut,
1842  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_POINT_CLOUD_CARTESIAN_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
1843  {
1844  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_POINT_CLOUD_CARTESIAN;
1845  goto exit;
1846  }
1847 
1848  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.detObjOutSideInfo,
1849  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_POINT_CLOUD_SIDE_INFO_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
1850  {
1851  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_POINT_CLOUD_SIDE_INFO;
1852  goto exit;
1853  }
1854 
1855  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.azimuthStaticHeatMap,
1856  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_AZIMUTH_STATIC_HEAT_MAP_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
1857  {
1858  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_AZIMUTH_STATIC_HEAT_MAP;
1859  goto exit;
1860  }
1861 
1862  /* Check if radar cube range column fits into one HWA memory bank */
1863  if((aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas * aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas *
1864  aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numDopplerChirps * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t)) > (SOC_HWA_MEM_SIZE/SOC_HWA_NUM_MEM_BANKS))
1865  {
1866  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EEXCEEDHWAMEM;
1867  goto exit;
1868  }
1869 
1870  /* Check if complex values of 2D FFT fit in two HWA memory banks */
1871  if((aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numTxAntennas * aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numRxAntennas *
1872  aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numDopplerBins * sizeof(cmplx16ImRe_t)) > (2 * SOC_HWA_MEM_SIZE/SOC_HWA_NUM_MEM_BANKS))
1873  {
1874  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EEXCEEDHWAMEM;
1875  goto exit;
1876  }
1877 
1878  /* Check Heapmap configuration */
1879  if (aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap)
1880  {
1881  if (aoaHwaCfg->res.azimuthStaticHeatMapSize !=
1882  (aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numRangeBins * aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numVirtualAntAzim))
1883  {
1884  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEM__AZIMUTH_STATIC_HEAT_MAP;
1885  goto exit;
1886  }
1887 
1888  if (aoaHwaCfg->res.azimuthStaticHeatMap == NULL)
1889  {
1890  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
1891  goto exit;
1892  }
1893  }
1894 
1895  if MEM_IS_NOT_ALIGN(aoaHwaCfg->res.detObjElevationAngle,
1896  DPU_AOAPROCHWA_DET_OBJ_ELEVATION_ANGLE_BYTE_ALIGNMENT)
1897  {
1898  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_ENOMEMALIGN_DET_OBJ_ELEVATION_ANGLE;
1899  goto exit;
1900  }
1901 
1902  if (aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap && (aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg.numVirtualAntAzim == 1))
1903  {
1904  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVALID_NUM_VIRT_ANT_AND_AZIMUTH_STATIC_HEAT_MAP;
1905  goto exit;
1906  }
1907 
1908 #if DEBUG_CHECK_PARAMS
1909  /* Validate params */
1910  if(!aoaHwaCfg->edmaHandle ||
1911  !aoaHwaCfg->hwaHandle ||
1912  !aoaHwaCfg->params ||
1913  !aoaHwaCfg->radarCube ||
1914  !aoaHwaCfg->detObjOut ||
1915  (aoaHwaCfg->numParamSet != 1)
1916  )
1917  {
1918  retVal= DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
1919  goto exit;
1920  }
1921 #endif
1922  aoaHwaObj->res = aoaHwaCfg->res;
1923  aoaHwaObj->params = aoaHwaCfg->staticCfg;
1924 
1925  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg = *aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.compRxChanCfg;
1926  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg = *aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg;
1927  aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap = aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap;
1928  AoAProcHWA_ConvertFov(aoaHwaObj, aoaHwaCfg->dynCfg.fovAoaCfg);
1929 
1930  /* In interleave mode, only edmaOutCfgFmt is supported */
1931  retVal = HWA_getDMAChanIndex(aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle,
1932  aoaHwaCfg->res.edmaHwaOut.channel,
1933  &aoaHwaObj->dmaDestChannel);
1934  if (retVal != 0)
1935  {
1936  goto exit;
1937  }
1938 
1939  /* Windowing configuraiton in HWA */
1940  retVal = HWA_configRam(aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle,
1941  HWA_RAM_TYPE_WINDOW_RAM,
1942  (uint8_t *)aoaHwaCfg->res.hwaCfg.window,
1943  aoaHwaCfg->res.hwaCfg.windowSize, /* size in bytes */
1944  aoaHwaCfg->res.hwaCfg.winRamOffset * sizeof(uint32_t));
1945  if (retVal != 0)
1946  {
1947  goto exit;
1948  }
1949 exit:
1950  return retVal;
1951 }
1952 
1953 uint32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_process
1954 (
1955  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle handle,
1956  uint32_t numObjsIn,
1957  DPU_AoAProcHWA_OutParams *outParams
1958 )
1959 {
1960  volatile uint32_t startTime;
1961  volatile uint32_t startTime1;
1962  volatile uint32_t waitTimeLocal = 0;
1963  int32_t retVal = 0;
1964  uint16_t idx;
1965  float range;
1966  uint32_t numObjsOut = 0;
1967  uint16_t numParams;
1968  HWA_Handle hwaHandle;
1969  cmplx16ImRe_t *radarCubeBase;
1970 
1971  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj;
1972  DPU_AoAProcHWA_HW_Resources *res;
1973  DPU_AoAProcHWA_StaticConfig *DPParams;
1974 
1975  if (handle == NULL)
1976  {
1977  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
1978  goto exit;
1979  }
1980  aoaHwaObj = (AOAHwaObj *)handle;
1981  res = &aoaHwaObj->res;
1982  DPParams = &aoaHwaObj->params;
1983  radarCubeBase = (cmplx16ImRe_t *)res->radarCube.data;
1984  hwaHandle = aoaHwaObj->hwaHandle;
1985 
1986  startTime = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
1987 
1988  if (numObjsIn == 0U)
1989  {
1990  outParams->numAoADetectedPoints = numObjsIn;
1991  outParams->stats.waitTime = 0;
1992  outParams->stats.processingTime = 0;
1993  retVal = 0;
1994  goto exit;
1995  }
1996 
1997  /**********************************************/
1998  /* ENABLE NUMLOOPS DONE INTERRUPT FROM HWA */
1999  /**********************************************/
2000  retVal = HWA_enableDoneInterrupt(hwaHandle,
2001  AOAProcHWADoneIsrCallback,
2002  aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle);
2003  if (retVal != 0)
2004  {
2005  goto exit;
2006  }
2007 
2008  /* Azimuth heap doppler compensation */
2009  if (aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap)
2010  {
2011  /* Perform 2D FFT for all range bins and save zero Doppler bin */
2012  retVal = AoAProcHWA_PrepareRangeAzimuthHeatmap(aoaHwaObj,
2013  &waitTimeLocal);
2014  if (retVal != 0)
2015  {
2016  goto exit;
2017  }
2018  }
2019 
2020  /* Angle estimation */
2021  if(DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim == 1)
2022  {
2023  /*If there is only one virtual antenna, there is no
2024  need of azimuth FFT as azimuth can not be estimated.*/
2025 
2026  /* Limit number of input samples */
2027  if (numObjsIn > res->detObjOutMaxSize)
2028  {
2029  numObjsIn = res->detObjOutMaxSize;
2030  }
2031 
2032  /* Fill the output list */
2033  for(idx=0; idx < numObjsIn; idx++)
2034  {
2035  range = res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].rangeIdx * DPParams->rangeStep;
2036  res->detObjOut[idx].y = range;
2037  res->detObjOut[idx].x = 0.;
2038  res->detObjOut[idx].z = 0.;
2039 
2040  res->detObjOut[idx].velocity = DPParams->dopplerStep *
2041  DOPPLER_IDX_TO_SIGNED(res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].dopplerIdx,
2042  DPParams->numDopplerBins);
2043  res->detObjOutSideInfo[idx].snr = res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].snr;
2044  res->detObjOutSideInfo[idx].noise = res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].noise;
2045  }
2046  numObjsOut = numObjsIn;
2047  }
2048  else
2049  {
2050  uint32_t numObjsRemain;
2051  uint32_t objInStartIdx = 0;
2052  uint32_t numObjsPerChunk;
2053  uint32_t maxNumObjsPerChunk;
2054 
2055  uint32_t dstAddr;
2056 
2057  uint32_t RangeBinSize;
2058  uint32_t dopplerBinSize = sizeof(uint32_t) * (DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim + DPParams->numVirtualAntElev);
2059 
2060  /* Limit number of input samples */
2061  if(DPParams->numVirtualAntElev > 0)
2062  {
2063  maxNumObjsPerChunk = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_MAX_OBJ_WITH_3_TX_ANT;
2064  }
2065  else
2066  {
2067  maxNumObjsPerChunk = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_MAX_OBJ_WITH_2_TX_ANT;
2068  }
2069 
2070  /* Limit number of input samples */
2071  if (numObjsIn > res->detObjOutMaxSize)
2072  {
2073  numObjsIn = res->detObjOutMaxSize;
2074  }
2075 
2076  numObjsRemain = numObjsIn;
2077  while (objInStartIdx < numObjsIn)
2078  {
2079  numObjsPerChunk = MIN(numObjsRemain, maxNumObjsPerChunk);
2080 
2081  /* Perform 2D FFT for detected Objects */
2082  retVal = HWAutil_configDopplerFFTSingleRangeBin(hwaHandle,
2083  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx,
2084  DPParams->numDopplerChirps,
2085  DPParams->numDopplerBins,
2086  DPParams->numDopplerBins,
2087  DPParams->numRxAntennas,
2088  DPParams->numTxAntennas,
2089  DPParams->numTxAntennas,
2090  res->hwaCfg.winRamOffset,
2091  res->hwaCfg.winSym,
2092  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx /* dmaTriggerSrc */,
2093  aoaHwaObj->dmaDestChannel,
2094  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_2DFFT_SINGLE_BIN_INP_HWA_MEM_BANK]),
2095  ADDR_TRANSLATE_CPU_TO_HWA(aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_2DFFT_SINGLE_BIN_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK]));
2096 
2097  if (retVal != 0)
2098  {
2099  goto exit;
2100  }
2101 
2102  numParams = DPParams->numTxAntennas;
2103  retVal = AoAProc_HWAutil_configCommon (hwaHandle,
2104  numObjsPerChunk, //numLoops,
2105  res->hwaCfg.paramSetStartIdx, //paramStartIdx,
2106  numParams);
2107  if (retVal != 0)
2108  {
2109  goto exit;
2110  }
2111 
2112  /* Configure input EDMA */
2113  retVal = AoAProcHWA_config2DSingleBinInp_EDMA(hwaHandle, res,
2114  DPParams,
2115  (uint32_t) radarCubeBase,
2116  (uint32_t)aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_2DFFT_SINGLE_BIN_INP_HWA_MEM_BANK],
2117  numObjsPerChunk,
2118  false);
2119  if (retVal != 0)
2120  {
2121  goto exit;
2122  }
2123 
2124  /* Configure output EDMA */
2125  retVal = AoAProcHWA_config2DSingleBinOut_EDMA( res,
2126  DPParams,
2127  ((uint32_t)aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_2DFFT_SINGLE_BIN_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK]),
2128  (uint32_t) aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf,
2129  numObjsPerChunk,
2130  false);
2131  if (retVal != 0)
2132  {
2133  goto exit;
2134  }
2135 
2136  /* Enable the HWA */
2137  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 1);
2138  if (retVal != 0)
2139  {
2140  goto exit;
2141  }
2142 
2143  /* Virtual antenna buffer in HWA as input to angle FFT */
2144  dstAddr = (uint32_t)aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_ANGLE_INP_HWA_MEM_BANK];
2145 
2146  for(idx = objInStartIdx; idx < (objInStartIdx + numObjsPerChunk); idx++)
2147  {
2148  RangeBinSize = 1;
2149  retVal= AoAProcHWA_setSource2DSingleBinInp_EDMA(res,
2150  (uint32_t)(&radarCubeBase[RangeBinSize * res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].rangeIdx]));
2151  if (retVal != 0)
2152  {
2153  goto exit;
2154  }
2155 
2156  retVal = AoAProcHWA_setSource2DSingleBinOut_EDMA(res,
2157  ((uint32_t)(aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_2DFFT_SINGLE_BIN_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK])) +
2158  res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx].dopplerIdx * dopplerBinSize);
2159  if (retVal != 0)
2160  {
2161  goto exit;
2162  }
2163 
2164  /* Trigger single 2D FFT */
2165  retVal = AoAProcHWA_dataPathTrigger2DSingleBin(res->edmaHandle,
2166  hwaHandle,
2167  res->edmaHwaIn.channel); //MMW_EDMA_2DFFT_SINGLERBIN_CH_ID
2168 
2169  if (retVal != 0)
2170  {
2171  goto exit;
2172  }
2173 
2174  /* Wait until EDMA output is done */
2175  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
2176  retVal = AOAHWA_waitSinglePointFftEdmaOut(aoaHwaObj);
2177  waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
2178  if (retVal != 0)
2179  {
2180  goto exit;
2181  }
2182 
2183  /* Rx channel gain/phase offset compensation */
2184  AoAProcHWA_rxChanPhaseBiasCompensation(&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg.rxChPhaseComp[0],
2185  1,
2186  DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim + DPParams->numVirtualAntElev,
2187  (cmplx16ImRe_t *) aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf,
2188  (cmplx16ImRe_t *) aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf);
2189 
2190  /* Doppler Compensation */
2191  aoaHwa_dopplerCompensation(1,
2192  (uint32_t *) aoaHwaObj->azimElevLocalBuf,
2193  &res->cfarRngDopSnrList[idx],
2194  (uint32_t *) dstAddr,
2195  DPParams->numTxAntennas,
2196  DPParams->numRxAntennas,
2197  DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim,
2198  DPParams->numVirtualAntElev,
2199  DPParams->numDopplerBins);
2200 
2201  dstAddr += (DPParams->numVirtualAntAzim + DPParams->numVirtualAntElev) * sizeof(uint32_t);
2202  } /* numObjsPerChunk loop */
2203 
2204  /* Wait until HWA done with FFT. This code is redundant because HWA will be done
2205  * by this time (output EDMA triggers on each iteration in above loop
2206  * only after HWA is done for that iteration) */
2207  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
2208  retVal = AoAProcHWA_dataPathWait2DFFTDetObj(aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle);
2209  waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
2210 
2211  /* Angle estimation - Azimuth FFTs */
2212  retVal = AoAProcHWA_dataPathConfigHwaAoa(hwaHandle, res, DPParams,
2213  numObjsPerChunk, &aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[0]);
2214  if (retVal < 0)
2215  {
2216  goto exit;
2217  }
2218 
2219 #ifdef SUBSYS_MSS
2220  /* Ensure R4F writes to HWA memory is flushed out */
2221  MEM_BARRIER();
2222 #endif
2223 
2224  /* Enable the HWA */
2225  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle,1);
2226  if (retVal != 0)
2227  {
2228  goto exit;
2229  }
2230 
2231  /* Wait for HWA finish */
2232  startTime1 = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp();
2233  AoAProcHWA_dataPathWait2DFFTDetObj(aoaHwaObj->hwaDone_semaHandle);
2234  waitTimeLocal += Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime1;
2235 
2236  /* Disable the HWA */
2237  retVal = HWA_enable(hwaHandle, 0);
2238  if (retVal != 0)
2239  {
2240  goto exit;
2241  }
2242 
2243  /* Azimuth FFT done!*/
2244  numObjsOut = AoAProcHWA_angleEstimationAzimElev(objInStartIdx,
2245  numObjsPerChunk,
2246  (uint16_t *)aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_ANGLE_AZIM_ABS_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK],
2247  (uint16_t *)aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_ANGLE_AZIM_CPLX_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK],
2248  (uint16_t *)aoaHwaObj->hwaMemBankAddr[AOAHWA_ANGLE_ELEV_CPLX_OUT_HWA_MEM_BANK],
2249  aoaHwaObj,
2250  numObjsOut);
2251 
2252  objInStartIdx += numObjsPerChunk;
2253  numObjsRemain -= numObjsPerChunk;
2254  }//End of while loop (processing per chunk)
2255  }
2256 
2257  outParams->numAoADetectedPoints = numObjsOut;
2258  outParams->stats.waitTime = waitTimeLocal;
2259  outParams->stats.processingTime = Cycleprofiler_getTimeStamp() - startTime - waitTimeLocal;
2260  /* Process is done, disable Done interrupt */
2261  HWA_disableDoneInterrupt(hwaHandle);
2262 exit:
2263  return retVal;
2264 }
2265 
2266 int32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_control
2267 (
2268  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle handle,
2269  DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd cmd,
2270  void *arg,
2271  uint32_t argSize
2272 )
2273 {
2274  int32_t retVal = 0;
2275  AOAHwaObj *aoaHwaObj = (AOAHwaObj *)handle;
2276 
2277  /* Get rangeProc data object */
2278  if (aoaHwaObj == NULL)
2279  {
2280  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2281  goto exit;
2282  }
2283 
2284  switch(cmd)
2285  {
2286  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_FovAoACfg:
2287  {
2288  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_AoAProc_FovAoaCfg)) ||
2289  (arg == NULL))
2290  {
2291  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2292  goto exit;
2293  }
2294  else
2295  {
2296  /* Save configuration */
2297  AoAProcHWA_ConvertFov(aoaHwaObj, (DPU_AoAProc_FovAoaCfg *) arg);
2298 
2299  }
2300  }
2301  break;
2302  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_MultiObjBeamFormingCfg:
2303  {
2304  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_AoAProc_MultiObjBeamFormingCfg)) ||
2305  (arg == NULL))
2306  {
2307  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2308  goto exit;
2309  }
2310  else
2311  {
2312  /* Save configuration */
2313  memcpy((void *)&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.multiObjBeamFormingCfg, arg, argSize);
2314  }
2315  }
2316  break;
2317  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_CompRxChannelBiasCfg:
2318  {
2319  if((argSize != sizeof(DPU_AoAProc_compRxChannelBiasCfg)) ||
2320  (arg == NULL))
2321  {
2322  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2323  goto exit;
2324  }
2325  else
2326  {
2327  /* Save configuration */
2328  memcpy((void *)&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.compRxChanCfg, arg, argSize);
2329  }
2330  }
2331  break;
2332  case DPU_AoAProcHWA_Cmd_PrepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap:
2333  {
2334  if((argSize != sizeof(bool)) ||
2335  (arg == NULL))
2336  {
2337  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2338  goto exit;
2339  }
2340  else
2341  {
2342  /* Sanity check on saved heapmap ptr and size */
2343  if ((aoaHwaObj->res.azimuthStaticHeatMapSize !=
2344  (aoaHwaObj->params.numRangeBins * aoaHwaObj->params.numVirtualAntAzim)) ||
2345  (aoaHwaObj->res.azimuthStaticHeatMap == NULL))
2346  {
2347  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2348  goto exit;
2349  }
2350 
2351  /* Save configuration */
2352  memcpy((void *)&aoaHwaObj->dynLocalCfg.prepareRangeAzimuthHeatMap, arg, argSize);
2353  }
2354  }
2355  break;
2356  default:
2357  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2358  break;
2359  }
2360 exit:
2361  return (retVal);
2362 }
2363 
2364 int32_t DPU_AoAProcHWA_deinit(DPU_AoAProcHWA_Handle handle)
2365 {
2366  int32_t retVal = 0;
2367 
2368  if (handle == NULL)
2369  {
2370  retVal = DPU_AOAPROCHWA_EINVAL;
2371  goto exit;
2372  }
2373  MemoryP_ctrlFree(handle, sizeof(AOAHwaObj));
2374 exit:
2375  return (retVal);
2376 }
